turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Which restaurant are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! What size pizza are you ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! And what are the toppings you would like on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pineapple and ham

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Is this order going to be carryout or deliver?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Carryout.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. You have one order for a large two topping pizza with pineapple and ham. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Let me place the order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! The order has been placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! Your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you! Goodbye.
